General.Name: Banco Patagonia
General.Description: Banco Patagonia S.A. provides various banking products and services in Argentina. It offers savings, retired, current, agro, and minor accounts; accounts for SMEs; foreign trade services, including payment orders, collection, import leasing, transfers abroad, credit letters, and financing products. The company also provides Patagonia leasing, capital marketing, and financing alternative services. In addition, it offers loans; security boxes; credit and debit cards; and accident, personal protection, injury, health, unemployment and disability, daily rent, burial, life, consumer, women's health, pet, car, protected bag and belonging, home, motorcycle, trade, mobility, multi-assistance services, and tecno insurance products, as well as agricultural insurance, money insurance, and student scholarship products. Further, the company provides financial agency services; mobile banking; investments for fixed-term, mutual funds, and financial trusts; and collection, payment, business cards, inter-banking, interfaces, and AFIP services. It serves individuals, businesses, professionals, SMEs, agro-business clients, the public sector, and institutional clients. The company was incorporated in 1928 and is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina. Banco Patagonia S.A. operates as a subsidiary of Banco do Brasil S.A.
General.Address: Avenida de Mayo 701, Buenos Aires, Argentina
